categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: Sometime between 0 BBY and 3 ABY the Commander of the Renegade Squadron Han Solo and some of the squadron's members were captured by the Galactic Empire and sent to the Imperial-class Star Destroyer Devastator to be used as test subjects. Determined to save Chewie and the other Renegade Squadron members, Han planed an escape from the Star Destroyer.
